articles.author: Brian Fung, CNN Business
articles.title: The antitrust lawsuits against Google just keep coming
articles.description: As many as 38 state attorneys general filed the latest suit against Google Thursday. The suit alleges that the company has abused a monopoly in the markets for online search and search advertising.

articles.author: Jeff Zeleny, Senior Washington Correspondent
articles.title: Biden expected to nominate North Carolina environmental official to run EPA
articles.description: President-elect Joe Biden is poised to nominate Michael Regan of North Carolina to run the Environmental Protection Agency, two people familiar with the matter tell CNN.

articles.author: Martijn Edelman and George Ramsay, CNN
articles.title: Russia's doping ban reduced to two years, Court of Arbitration for Sport rules
articles.description: Russia's ban from major international sporting events has been halved by the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS), but the country will still not be represented at next year's Olympics or the 2022 FIFA World Cup.

articles.author: Paul R. La Monica, CNN Business
articles.title: Joe Biden's financial team could create a giant stock bubble
articles.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has made abundantly clear that he is more concerned about the challenging job market than the possibility that more stimulus may eventually lead to higher inflation. It's a view shared by his former boss -- Janet Yellen.

articles.title: Black children are 6 times more likely to be shot to death by police, study finds
